data.message: Hey em.. what's up My life is going pretty good right now I'm prolly Gunna move to Kentucky with a old flame.. I just got outta prison June 25 a month ago... my friends are always runnin roud like chickens with there head cut off.. I'm tryin to not be a Kevin Gates song paper chasers..in my son eyes that's his song for Mama.. he is 17 now crazy huh..heck I look 22 but I'm 35.. My Kentucky bf I mentioned knows how to make that stuff I get crazy on.. pray 4 me Em k.. remember my wishes for my son.. I'm your fan always..
